alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Dougherty; Lee; Randolph; Terrell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 26 at 4:45PM EDT until April 26 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... Southeastern Randolph County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Lee County in southwestern Georgia... Northeastern Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... Southern Terrell County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 444 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Shellman, or 8 miles west of Dawson, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dawson, Albany, Shellman, Walker, Sasser, Forrester, Lockett Crossing, South Albany, Southwest Ga Regional A/P, Palmyra, Herod, Ducker, Clarks Mill, Dawson Municipal A/P, Byne Crossroads, Graves, Armena, Martins Crossroads, Chickasawhatchee and Doverel. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
